name: Dark 'N' Stormy
description: Originating from Bermuda, the Dark 'N' Stormy is steeped in seafaring history and carries the evocative power of a maritime storm. This robust cocktail features dark rum, known for its deep, molasses-rich flavor, floating atop spicy ginger beer. It's this dramatic interplay, akin to storm clouds brooding over turbulent seas, that gives the cocktail its name. Finished with a splash of lime juice for a fresh kick, the Dark 'N' Stormy offers a captivating flavor journey with every sip.
instructions: Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour ginger beer into the glass.
Pour rum into the glass- if you pour carefully, the rum should float atop the ginger beer.
Serve cold and stir before drinking.
